title: I want to build a Plat+ Team to play in tournaments
body:
Hello Summoners,

I want to build a team of players to practice, develop champion pools, gain better game knowledge, mechanics, and overall just have fun. I would however like to have a more serious team and have practices 2-3 times a week. If this is not something your interested in or willing to commit to then this may not be right for you. I think doing this with a team will help me better my own skills and get higher in Flex/solo queue. 

A few requirementsL
- English Speaking
- Preferably over the age of 20 (least I will go is 18) 
- Be committed
- Be a team player

About me
I am 28
Played league since season 2
highest elo achieved was plat 2
I am a mid lane main


If you are interested please add me on Discord LeftyRaydy#6619 and let me know the following
Age -
Current rank in League
Highest Rank achieved in League
Main Role
Secondary Role
top 3 champions for your primary role
1 champion you would really like to learn
Time Zone -
availability to practice each week
Profession (if you are working)
finally why you would like to create a team/be on a team?

I look forward to hearing from you!
